Html:
Hello,

 

I am trying to open the Irony project alpha release in VS2008 SP1. I'm geeting a series of source control errors, culminating in an error referencing vapifunctionwrapper.cpp. None of the projects are available.

Please advise.

 

-Chris
you should remove source control binding on first start; see "Use Irony on Mono" discussion thread, just a little ago.
